tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Reena John has been our family dentist since 2004. Which explains it all. Dr. Reena has always sorted my health issues and taken care of my emergencies right on time, by providing appointments as per the need. 

Have always recommended my known circle to visit Dr. Reena.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: extremely satisfying!!! no waiting time. Doctor is very accomplished!!!! She is very friendly. Everything that I want in a dentist!!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Reena is a soft spoken and highly experienced doctor. This is my 5th year knowing her and I am quite happy with the overall processes.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Today Our appointment is at 9.45am, we reach there around 10.10am, Doctor was there & no other patient was sitting. Me & my husband wanted the service that is scaling/polishing. We thought so on practo is 400 consultation ..so we thought more or less 800 for two, but scaling charges are so high we couldnt say a word there, She charge 900 for scaling what is just 10-15mins of it for an individual..we endup paying 2600 *** ********* ********** **** *** ******* *** ****** **** ******************Very disappointing! *** ****** **** **** **** *** ******* ***** ** *** *** ********* **** ******* **** *********NOT RECOMMENDED.

review: Clarity in simplicity in treatment approach. Ease and clarity in explanation.  Ease of appointment schedules.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi , Dr Reena is vv friendly n makes one feel v comfortable . Always smiling. Good clinic n reasonable. Vv well satisfied. Highly recommend her to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I went for full denture for my Mom.

Dr. Reena was supportive throughout our visits. Her experience and patience is distinctive. She is quite on time with appointment and her lab techs are also quite good. She took extra care for my Mom as she is 55+. Throughout my visit i felt strongly that i made the right decision.

Overall i am quite happy with her help and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Reena a very friendly doctor.. My son loves to see her.. she's very friendly, interactive doctor who explains things nicely in layman's language... Highly qualified doctor who doesn't suggests unnecessary treatment. Her clinic is in Indiranagar (Carlton Towers), well maintained and hygienic . Covid protocols are strictly followed at the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Reena was amicable, listened patiently to my medical history, and answered all my questions elaborately. Sanitation for Covid19 was excellent. I did not have to wait for my appointment to start beyond the scheduled time, and the clinic location is very accessible from Old AirportRoad .

review: I am glad to have found Dr. Reena for my RCT. She is a very patient doctor who explains you everything in detail and makes sure that she has informed you enough so that you can make treatment decisions. She never pushes you to get something done and doesn't hurry with the treatment once you have signed for it. I would recommend everyone in the near by area to visit her in case of any dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr Reena has been our family dentist for over 20 years. I have always felt welcome at the clinic because of her warmth and that oh-so-important personal touch. Besides, she is not an alarmist like my previous dentist. My entire family has been going to her forever, and we wouldn't dream of going to anyone else!
reply_text: Thank you Geetha for your kind words.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr. Reena John , dentist for the tooth infection but she is highly unprofessional *** **** *** **** *** *******Though her visiting fee is ₹400, she charged ₹750 that toowithout any receipt. She told ₹350 is for x-ray that she took but never gave the x-ray plate.******** **** *** ********** **** ****** ****** ******** ******** ** ** * ****** ************** ***** ******* *** * *** ** **** ****** ** *I won't recommend her to anyone.
reply_text: Dear patient,my website clearly shows the consultation charges as.400/- . With your permission,a digital x-ray has been taken for further diagnosis. Any treatment/ x-rays done after a consultation is chargeable anywhere. As the x-ray is digital, I had informed you to take a photo of the x-ray or else copy it into a usb stick, for which you had said you would take it on your next appointment, for which you didn't turn up.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent as always. Been her patient since 2008. She is gentle, patient and very considerate.  I would recommend her anyday.
I have been going to Dr. Reena since childhood. She is a dentist I am extremely comfortable with. She is warm and cheerful. *** ** **** **** ******* ** *** *** *** ** very affordable.
Have been with Dr Reena for the last 35 yrs.. After Corona visited her today...as cheerful and friendly as ever....so comfortable with her to get complications of any kind with teeth treated.
